title: [K-12] Augmented Reality-Based Science Inquiry English Speaking Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English sentence construction skills and comprehension of everyday conversational proficiency
context.additional_context: Smartphone-Centric AR App-Enabled Environment: Task-Oriented Learning for Expressing Science Experiments/Inquiries in English

learning_goals: Learners can communicate in English for five or more sentences in science laboratory situations
Learners can explain virtual experiment processes using AR apps while achieving 80% native speaker pronunciation accuracy
Learners can submit two or more revised speaking scripts incorporating peer evaluations and teacher feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
